oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Evaluation of On-Arrival or Prompted Metaphylaxis Regimens Using Ceftiofur Crystalline Free Acid for Feedlot Heifers at Risk of Developing Bovine Respiratory Disease
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Johnson, J. C.
Bryson, W. L.
Barringer, L. S.
Hunsaker, B. D.
Harper, L. B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: MTX
BRD
bovine respiratory disease
antimicrobial administration
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In northern, ranch-fresh calves, MTX reduces the incidence of BRD and has better utility administered on arrival compared with relying on morbidity as a signal for timing antimicrobial administration.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2008; 263
